price: (60) So be patient. Indeed, the promise of Allāh is truth. And let them not disquiet you who are not certain [in faith].
arabic: فَٱصۡبِرۡ إِنَّ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٞۖ وَلَا يَسۡتَخِفَّنَّكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُوقِنُونَ
